Name: Issue 352
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #352 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week. It's finally happened - .NET Maui has finally gone General Availability (GA). That's a massive achievement! A big congratulations to the MAUI team for all their hard work. If you are getting started there are some great resources linked out in this weeks edition. Now go have fun with MAUI, and have a fantastic week. Kym

Articles.Title: Introducing .NET MAUI - One Codebase, Many Platforms
Articles.Description: MAUI is GA! - Welcome to .NET Multi-platform App UI. This release marks a new milestone in the multi-year journey to unify the .NET platform.
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Visual Studio at Microsoft Build 2022
Articles.Description: Roundup of the news related to Visual Studio at Build 2022
Articles.Author: Chris Hardy

Articles.Title: Build mobile and desktop apps with .NET MAUI - Learn
Articles.Description: This is the Microsoft self-paced training on .NET MAUI. In this learning path, use C# and Visual Studio with .NET MAUI to create an app that runs across iOS, Android, and Windows.
Articles.Author: Microsoft Learn

Articles.Title: Page Navigation in .NET MAUI: An Overview
Articles.Description: Let’s see how we can integrate page navigation in your .NET MAUI application with code examples.
Articles.Author: Selva Ganapathy Kathiresan

Articles.Title: macOS Environment Setup For MAUI Development
Articles.Description: This post will walk you through all the steps you need to take to prepare your environment for MAUI development on macOS. If you follow the steps, you’ll have a development environment ready to write MAUI apps targeting macOS, iOS, and Android.
Articles.Author: Khalid Abuhakmeh

Articles.Title: #7DaysChallenge – .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: Leomaris Reyes is sharing seven challenges which will be divided into one challenge for each day of this week which will help you continue practicing and reinforcing your knowledge of Xamarin Forms and .NET MAUI!
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Multi-target Xamarin.Forms and .NET MAUI from a single project
Articles.Description: Share more code between Xamarin.Forms and .NET MAUI. Migrate effortlessly to the latest and greatest.
Articles.Author: Vijay Anand EG

Articles.Title: Sands of MAUI: Issue #58
Articles.Description: All the happenings this week in the MAUI community
Articles.Author: Sam Basu

Articles.Title: Why so serious? Smile analysis with Azure and .NET MAUI - Andreas Nesheim
Articles.Description: This post shows you how you can use Face API in Azure and .NET MAUI to create an app where you can take a picture of yourself and get an objective result of how much you’re smiling!
Articles.Author: Andreas Nesheim

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 308: James & Frank Go To Build 2022!
Articles.Description: Frank and James cover all the great developer bits from Build 2022 including Win UI 3, Project Voleterra, Arm64, .NET MAUI Launch, and so much more.
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Learn .NET MAUI - Full Course for Beginners | Build cross-platform apps in C#
Articles.Description: James walks through the full day workshop (.NET MAUI Workshop in a Box) showing how to build apps with .NET MAUI for iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: The .NET MAUI Podcast Episode 111: Aloha .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: It's out - it's GA - move all your apps now. .NET MAUI is released.

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 307: All in on .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: .NET MAUI is here, and Frank is all in on building apps with it! He has started to migrate his apps and shares his journey!
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Intro to Shell in .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: In this video, Daniel will give you an intro to .NET MAUI Shell and how to use that to create the main layout and navigation in an app.
Articles.Author: Daniel Hindrikes

Articles.Title: Visual Studio 2022 for Mac is now available
Articles.Description: Now available: the general availability (GA) release of Visual Studio 2022 for Mac v17.0 . This is the fastest Visual Studio for Mac version yet with an all new native macOS UI, fully running on .NET 6, and optimized for Apple Silicon (ARM64) processors.
Articles.Author: Jordan Matthiesen

Articles.Title: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI Goes GA: 50+ Controls!
Articles.Description: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI is officially out of the preview and experimental stage and a production-ready UI component library: Telerik UI for .NET MAUI 1.0.0!
